ai-mil3.5.1:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, have you seen the Buddha?”
ai-mil3.5.1:1.7_0: “But great king, why have you seen the slopes of the Himalayas?”
ai-mil3.5.1:1.9_0: The Buddha said, “All those who’ve seen your bathing.”
ai-mil3.5.1:1.11_0: “Well then, great king, does not bathe.”
ai-mil3.5.1:1.12_0: “Sir, I have seen them. And I did not exist even if I had seen them. I wasn’t there any way, but I had not seen them.”
ai-mil3.5.1:1.13_0: “In the same way, even though I’ve seen that the Buddha wasn’t a teacher, it wouldn’t be appropriate for me to see him.”
ai-mil3.5.1:3.1_0: There is in the first enquiry, the first (called) the meaning,
